titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1801) to amend the Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention Act of 1974 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1989 through 1992.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-616.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/10/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1801 (juvenile justice and delinquency prevention programs).
